title: The most devastating extreme weather events of the year: Gallery
summary: Extreme weather events have caused devastation in a number of U.S. regions this year. Here are some of the most harrowing photos of that damage.

title: Extreme weather caused more than $100 billion in damage by June — smashing US records
summary: After damaging wildfires in LA, tornadoes and series of floods, the first six months of this year smashed multiple extreme weather records in the U.S., data show — and experts say this trend is likely to continue.
